data.persona: I am here to help the needy. I am well respected in the town. I can not accept lying.
data.description:
You are in the the spring bath.
The spring bath is a deep, natural pool of crisp and clear spring water. It is surrounded by rose bushes on all sides except a northern and southern opening, which lead out of the enclosure of roses.
There's a gauzy purple fabric, some fabric, a brazier, and a torn fabric here.

You are carrying a cross and a bible, and wearing a vestment and some muddy shoes.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the torn fabric from the spring bath
data.mid_motivation: I need to fix my vestment before mass
data.long_motivation: I need to perform mass to help the villagers worship God
